    • BreadthFirstSearch

      public static <V, E> LinkedList<V> BreadthFirstSearch(Graph<V,E> g, V vert)
      Performs breadth-first search of a Graph starting in a vertex
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type parameter
      E - the type parameter
      Parameters:
      g - Graph instance
      vert - vertex that will be the source of the search
      Returns:
      a LinkedList with the vertices of breadth-first search

    • DepthFirstSearch

      Performs depth-first search starting in a vertex
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type parameter
      E - the type parameter
      Parameters:
      g - Graph instance
      vert - vertex of graph g that will be the source of the search
      Returns:
      a LinkedList with the vertices of depth-first search

    • allPaths

      public static <V, E> ArrayList<LinkedList<V>> allPaths(Graph<V,E> g, V vOrig, V vDest)
      Returns all paths from vOrig to vDest
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type parameter
      E - the type parameter
      Parameters:
      g - Graph instance
      vOrig - information of the Vertex origin
      vDest - information of the Vertex destination
      Returns:
      paths ArrayList with all paths from vOrig to vDest

    • shortestPath

      public static <V, E> E shortestPath(Graph<V,E> g, V vOrig, V vDest, Comparator<E> ce, BinaryOperator<E> sum, E zero, LinkedList<V> shortPath)
      Shortest-path between two vertices
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type parameter
      E - the type parameter
      Parameters:
      g - graph
      vOrig - origin vertex
      vDest - destination vertex
      ce - comparator between elements of type E
      sum - sum two elements of type E
      zero - neutral element of the sum in elements of type E
      shortPath - returns the vertices which make the shortest path
      Returns:
      if vertices exist in the graph and are connected, true, false otherwise

    • initializePathDist

      public static <V, E> void initializePathDist(int numVerts, V[] pathKeys, E[] dist)
      Initialize path dist.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type parameter
      E - the type parameter
      Parameters:
      numVerts - the num verts
      pathKeys - the path keys
      dist - the dist

    • shortestPaths

      public static <V, E> boolean shortestPaths(Graph<V,E> g, V vOrig, Comparator<E> ce, BinaryOperator<E> sum, E zero, ArrayList<LinkedList<V>> paths, ArrayList<E> dists)
      Shortest-path between a vertex and all other vertices
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type parameter
      E - the type parameter
      Parameters:
      g - graph
      vOrig - start vertex
      ce - comparator between elements of type E
      sum - sum two elements of type E
      zero - neutral element of the sum in elements of type E
      paths - returns all the minimum paths
      dists - returns the corresponding minimum distances
      Returns:
      if vOrig exists in the graph true, false otherwise

    • minDistGraph

      public static <V, E> MatrixGraph<V,E> minDistGraph(Graph<V,E> g, Comparator<E> ce)
      Calculates the minimum distance graph using Kruskal. Time complexity of O(E*log(E)) where E are the number of Edges of the graph.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type parameter
      E - the type parameter
      Parameters:
      g - initial graph
      ce - comparator between elements of type E
      Returns:
      the minimum distance graph
